mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT R.*, M.MNAME, M.MPHOTO FROM REVIEW R, MEMBER M WHERE R.MID = M.MID ORDER BY REVIEWNO DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEWNO, MID, RTITLE, RCONTENT) VALUES (REVIEWNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mid}, #{rtitle}, #{rcontent})
mapper.select: SELECT R.*, M.MNAME, M.MPHOTO FROM REVIEW R, MEMBER M WHERE R.MID = M.MID AND REVIEWNO = #{reviewno}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET RHIT = RHIT + 1 WHERE REVIEWNO = #{reviewno}
